Terminators
; or any other nonnumeric or nonalphabetic char
LF
next mnemonic

bei LB ist das aktuelle Terminatorzeichen ma√ügeblich. Default chr$(3)

Error codes
0 no error
1 instruction not recognized
2 wrong number of parameters
3 bad parameter
4 not used
5 unknown character set
6 position overflow (LB, UC, CP processing)
7 not used
8 n/a

c=getch
while true
   numchar=0
   islb=False

  while true
     buffer[numchar]= c
     if islb and c= termchar
        break
     if not islb and c is not numeric or alphabetic
        break
     numchar++
     if numchar==2 and buffer [0,1]= "LB"
        islb= True
     c=getch
  process hpgl
